person.person-note: elected 13 November 2016, inaugurated 22 January 2017; re-elected 21 November 2021, inaugurated 19 January 2022

dir-section.heading: Council of Ministers
dir-section.p: Under the terms of a power-sharing agreement reached in June 2023, Mariya Gabriel had been expected to assume the premiership following the legislatureâ€™s approval of the resignation of Prime Minister Nikolai Denkov on 6 March 2024. However, efforts to form a government failed and legislative elections were scheduled for 9 June. A caretaker administration was appointed on 9 April.
